languages.text: {n}Соломон делает решительное движение, будто выдвигаясь вперед вас на линию огня.{/n} "Я напоминаю, Вольный Торговец Чорда, что ты можешь судить простых людей, но никак не равн{mf|ого|ую} себе. Тем более...". {n}Вы получаете долгий, пристальный взгляд.{/n} "{mf|Его|Ее}. Будь осторожна с обвинениями".

{n}Solomorne makes a decisive motion as if to step into the line of fire in front of you.{/n} "I remind you, Rogue Trader Chorda, that you may judge common people, but not someone who is your equal. Much less..." {n}You receive a long, hard stare.{/n} "...{mf|him|her}. Take care when making accusations."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон делает решительное движение, будто выдвигаясь вперед вас на линию огня.{/n} "Я напоминаю, Вольный Торговец Чорда, что ты можешь судить простых людей, но никак не равн{mf|ого|ую} себе. Тем более...". {n}Вы получаете долгий, пристальный взгляд.{/n} "{mf|Его|Ее}. Будь осторожна с обвинениями".

Much less..." {n}You receive a long, hard stare.{/n} "...{mf|him|her}. Take care when making accusations."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne macht eine entschlossene Bewegung, als wolle er sich vor dir in die Schusslinie stellen.{/n} "Ich muss Euch daran erinnern, Freihändlerin Chorda, dass Ihr gewöhnliche Leute richten dürft, nicht aber Euresgleichen. Schon gar nicht ..." {n}Er sieht dich lange an.{/n} "... {mf|ihn|sie}. Also seht Euch vor, wenn Ihr Anklage erhebt."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne makes a decisive motion as if to step into the line of fire in front of you.{/n} "I remind you, Rogue Trader Chorda, that you may judge common people, but not someone who is your equal. Much less..." {n}You receive a long, hard stare.{/n} "...{mf|him|her}. Take care when making accusations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne macht eine entschlossene Bewegung, als wolle er sich vor dir in die Schusslinie stellen.{/n} "Ich muss Euch daran erinnern, Freihändlerin Chorda, dass Ihr gewöhnliche Leute richten dürft, nicht aber Euresgleichen. Schon gar nicht ..." {n}Er sieht dich lange an.{/n} "... {mf|ihn|sie}. Also seht Euch vor, wenn Ihr Anklage erhebt."

languages.text: {n}Sans un instant d'hésitation, Solomorne se place devant vous comme s'il voulait vous protéger d'un tir ennemi.{/n} « Libre-marchande Chorda, permettez-moi de vous rappeler que vous avez le droit de juger les gens du peuple, mais pas vos pairs. Et encore moins... {mf|lui|elle}, {n}ajoute-t-il en vous lançant un regard appuyé.{/n} Réfléchissez bien avant de proférer ce genre d'accusations. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne makes a decisive motion as if to step into the line of fire in front of you.{/n} "I remind you, Rogue Trader Chorda, that you may judge common people, but not someone who is your equal. Much less..." {n}You receive a long, hard stare.{/n} "...{mf|him|her}. Take care when making accusations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans un instant d'hésitation, Solomorne se place devant vous comme s'il voulait vous protéger d'un tir ennemi.{/n} « Libre-marchande Chorda, permettez-moi de vous rappeler que vous avez le droit de juger les gens du peuple, mais pas vos pairs. Et encore moins... {mf|lui|elle}, {n}ajoute-t-il en vous lançant un regard appuyé.{/n} Réfléchissez bien avant de proférer ce genre d'accusations. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは、まるであなたの前に立ちはだかり銃火の中に身を投じるかのような決然とした動きを見せた。{/n}「ローグトレーダー・チョーダ、思い出してください。あなたが裁くことができるのは庶民であって、自分と同格の者ではありません。ましてや…」{n}あなたは長く鋭い視線を受けた。{/n}「…{mf|彼|彼女}など。非難は慎重になさいますよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne makes a decisive motion as if to step into the line of fire in front of you.{/n} "I remind you, Rogue Trader Chorda, that you may judge common people, but not someone who is your equal. Much less..." {n}You receive a long, hard stare.{/n} "...{mf|him|her}. Take care when making accusations."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは、まるであなたの前に立ちはだかり銃火の中に身を投じるかのような決然とした動きを見せた。{/n}「ローグトレーダー・チョーダ、思い出してください。あなたが裁くことができるのは庶民であって、自分と同格の者ではありません。ましてや…」{n}あなたは長く鋭い視線を受けた。{/n}「…{mf|彼|彼女}など。非難は慎重になさいますよう」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se mueve con decisión, listo para interponerse en la línea de tiro delante de ti.{/n} «Le recuerdo, Comerciante Independiente Chorda, que puede juzgar a la plebe, pero no a su igual. Y mucho menos...». {n}Te mira largo y tendido.{/n} «... a {mf|él|ella}. Tenga cuidado con sus acusaciones».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne makes a decisive motion as if to step into the line of fire in front of you.{/n} "I remind you, Rogue Trader Chorda, that you may judge common people, but not someone who is your equal. Much less..." {n}You receive a long, hard stare.{/n} "...{mf|him|her}. Take care when making accusations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se mueve con decisión, listo para interponerse en la línea de tiro delante de ti.{/n} «Le recuerdo, Comerciante Independiente Chorda, que puede juzgar a la plebe, pero no a su igual. Y mucho menos...». {n}Te mira largo y tendido.{/n} «... a {mf|él|ella}. Tenga cuidado con sus acusaciones».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙果决地向前迈了一步，仿佛要抢在你前面冲入火线一样。{/n}“我得提醒你，行商浪人库尔达。你有权评判普通人，但你无权评判与你地位平等的人，更何况是……”{n}他盯着你看了很久很久。{/n}“……{mf|他|她}。指控的时候，要当心点。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne makes a decisive motion as if to step into the line of fire in front of you.{/n} "I remind you, Rogue Trader Chorda, that you may judge common people, but not someone who is your equal. Much less..." {n}You receive a long, hard stare.{/n} "...{mf|him|her}. Take care when making accusations."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙果决地向前迈了一步，仿佛要抢在你前面冲入火线一样。{/n}“我得提醒你，行商浪人库尔达。你有权评判普通人，但你无权评判与你地位平等的人，更何况是……”{n}他盯着你看了很久很久。{/n}“……{mf|他|她}。指控的时候，要当心点。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, önündeki ateş hattına girecekmiş gibi kararlı bir harekette bulunuyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir Chorda, hatırlatmalıyım ki sıradan insanları yargılayabilirsiniz ancak denginiz olanlara bunu yapamazsınız. Hele ki..." {n}Uzun ve sert bir bakışla karşı karşıya kalıyorsun.{/n} "Ona. Suçlamada bulunurken dikkatli olun."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne makes a decisive motion as if to step into the line of fire in front of you.{/n} "I remind you, Rogue Trader Chorda, that you may judge common people, but not someone who is your equal. Much less..." {n}You receive a long, hard stare.{/n} "...{mf|him|her}. Take care when making accusations."

Hele ki..." {n}Uzun ve sert bir bakışla karşı karşıya kalıyorsun.{/n} "Ona. Suçlamada bulunurken dikkatli olun."
